journal: The International Journal of Biochemistry & Cell Biology
title: Corrigendum to “Ku70 acetylation and modulation of c-Myc/ATF4/CHOP signaling axis by SIRT1 inhibition lead to sensitization of HepG2 cells to TRAIL through induction of DR5 and down-regulation of c-FLIP” [Int. J. Biochem. Cell Biol. 45 (2013) 711–723]
